website_summaries.verdict: With a winning combination of luxury and therapeutic functionality, this reasonably priced option is sure to please if secured pellets aren't a must-have feature.
pros: Weighted inner layer comes with an indulgently plush cover that's durable and easy to care for
Works especially well for restless leg syndrome, insomnia, and anxiety
Available in just about any size and weight
cons: The plastic beads aren't secured, and although the stitching helps keep them in place, you can expect some shifting

customer_reviews.title: I miss my wife
customer_reviews.text: I never considered the ramifications of this. Sure the wife loves it but if you buy it you’ll never be able to get close to your wife again. It creates a freaking wall of China in bed. It’s like she’s wearing a freaking suit of armor to bed every night. I hate this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Sleep 😴 improved drastically!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I’ve made this year!!! I’ve worked night shift they past 6 years. Sometimes falling asleep is a big problem. I purchased the 20 lb. With this blanket I can fall asleep in 5 minutes. NO JOKE! You feel snug and relax quickly. I have been raving about this blanket to everyone. Very well made. I bought a queen but wish I had bought 2 twin or lap size. One for me and one for him who hogs the blanket!! I suggest buying a duvet for easy washing!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wostbrock

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Calming Effect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the weighted blanket in the hopes that it would help reduce nerve pain, found the calming effect immediate, and look forward to more long-range benefits. The blanket has the weight I expected, breathes, and is not hot. The 100% cotton material was an important influence in my purchase and the two-tone gray is an attractive neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne L. Yeck

customer_reviews.title: Umm
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. Construction seems ok, much heavier than I anticipated but in retrospect that makes sense. However... I attached a photo where two things are visible. One is the sheet of use and care instructions. The other is the tag at the foot of the blanket. I’d ask the company which one is true but I feel I couldn’t trust their answer. Color me annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: It ripped immediately.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this at first, but it didn't even last a month before it developed a run in the fabric and spilled all over our floor. It's just the two of us; no kids or pets. We weren't hard on it at all. Whatever's inside is impossible to clean up; its longevity rivals that of glitter. It was awesome while it lasted, but we barely got any use out of it. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife has trouble sleeping since she was involved in a car accident years ago. I bought the 48x78 so it would cover her and her side of the bed. So far we both sleep better but time will tell when the weather warms back up. Had a 'new' odor so it had to air out before using. Main dislike at this time is that it came with no care instructions. I have updated the review to 5 star because the company did provide us with care instructions: dry clean or hand wash and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: According to my husband - “LOVE IT!”
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband and he LOVES it! He was laying in it for a few minutes and he said that he felt more calm and relaxed. He slept with it and the next morning said it was the best sleep he’s ever gotten in a very long time. I would highly recommend this to anyone who has anxiety or sleep issues
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sand inside - when it moves - wakes me up cuz it’s so loud.
customer_reviews.author: Stylinforu

customer_reviews.title: "Beads" started leaking out of it.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product because I have problems sleeping, and it worked, however there is one major problem - The "beads" that make the blanket weighted started falling out. There wasn't a hole or anything, but they just sort of sneaked through the fabric over time. It's pretty subtle, but once I took the cover off, there was a huge mess to clean up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Hoping For
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the weighted idea blanket after wanting to try a weighted blanket for about two years now. I finally had enough of the sleepless nights and decided to give it a try after all what have I got to lose? I have slept every night so comfortably since the day I received my new blanket. I missed out for 2 years! It's so hot during the summer and my husband can't stand to have thick heavy blankets but I need the weight for comfort. I now have my sheet and my blanket and sleep feeling soothed. Why did i wait so long!!
customer_reviews.author: Meegyn James

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and undistributed.  Unusuable as weighted blanket.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is cheaply made and not as described. I ordered a weighted blanket which was described as a blanket that advertised as having weight evenly distributed across the blanket. Instead some pockets had pellets and others were virtually empty. Sleeping in it felt like the weight was all on the blanket that was resting on the bed instead of me. When I asked for a return, they required me to pay the expensive postage back. I had ordered this one as a previous order of a similar product from a different company but received the same poor product. Edit: I got in touch with Weighted Idea they eventually gave me a refund for both the postage and item.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product!
customer_reviews.text: After using it for 1 week, I had the material from inside the blanket all over my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Florina Kadribasic

customer_reviews.title: Best money I've spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter (age 15) who has extreme anxiety, trouble sleeping and nightmares due to trama. She loves this blanket. She said it makes her feel safe and cozy. I am not working and it was hard to spend the money, but not I am so glad that I did. The only thing I would say it to think about how much weight is going to be on you if you have any trigger points in your body that act up. We ordered the 20lb blanket based on her weight and it is a bit much on some parts of her body if she doesn't shift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A True “security” blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Man! You wouldn’t think 20 lbs is all that much! This blanket, my fiancé says, is like a big hug! My fiancé loves heavy blankets for sleeping, although blankets of any kind make me SWEAT!!! I love that this is big enough to cover her up but leaves my side of the bed blanket free! She does say that it might be too heavy, as it starts hurting her hips if she sleeps too long underneath it. Overall, a fantastic present and a great experience, from ordering to delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Clark

customer_reviews.title: Slept through  Hurricane Florence!
customer_reviews.text: I have been curious for a long while about weighted blankets and how it may assist with my sleeping issues. I struggle with anxiety, tension, migraines and those terrible night ruminations! This was among the most affordable and better reviewed blankets I could find so I bought it. I received it nearly a week ago. I was going to wait longer to write a review, but I no longer need too. I hate storms and Whig out during even a simple thunder storm. I do not sleep during them. Well...I just slept through the night with hurricane Florence bombarding our area! Don't worry, I was not in the flood areas. The point is...I slept. I slept HARD! I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Do you like to sleep on the beach?...
customer_reviews.text: In theory, this blanket is great, the first few days were awesome...then came the sand storm...my blank leaks its insides 😖...which ups my anxiety and OCD...so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bates

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED it for 2 days/nights
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED it for 2 days/nights... I was sooo excited to receive it. on the 3rd night it ripped and beads went everywhere... its not even a seam but an L within the patch. I need to contact manufacturer tomorrow :(
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Dirty used
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package looks like someones dirty returned blanket... Will be returning and buying a different brand ***Update*** i received a brand new one within a few days of this review and it is as expected, Brand new and as i was hoping for. This blanket is great!!!!!!!!!!!! Great customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Earl

customer_reviews.title: Not CLOSE to fitting a king bed
customer_reviews.text: The 60x80 size shows photo of how it fits a king bed.......no where close! Only covers about half the bed top.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie MCGlamery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I need a lot of weight on me to sleep well, but in the summer that can mean too much heat from too many blankets. This weighted blanket helps to add the weight without the heat. I love how it helps me sleep better. So many of these blankets are very expensive, but this one isn't pricey, yet still completely delivers all that I was hoping for. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality not good. Stiching comes a part.
customer_reviews.text: I love my weighted blanket. I followed all care instructions but it has begun to fall apart. I have sewn many holes from wear stitching came a part. The stitching between squares was the first to go and the weight is no longer equally distributed. I am very sad by the quality of this blanket. Not worth the money. Find another company and hopefully you will get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: ADHD sleep solver
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has ADHD and sleep has always been an issue. The minute we pulled this blanket out of the box, she was in love. She laid it on her lap for the evening and at bedtime was asleep in 30 minutes. She was so excited when she woke up in the morning because for maybe the first time, she doesn't remember waking up at night. I look forward to this actually working over the long haul and not just another novelty. It's well-made and super soft.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Best night of sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: I had been seeing ads for weighted blankets for a long time and after reading a friends review decided to give it a try to see if it could help my sleep issues. I slept with it the first time last night. After finding a comfortable position for my injured knee, I fell asleep quickly and slept the entire night. No tossing and turning, no laying awake worrying about work, no dreams about work, no in and out of bed all night. I purchased the 20 pound blanket for those with stress, anxiety, sleeping issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Returned Item
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my niece, she found it annoying and it often slid onto the floor, so I paid shipping to return it as the return is not free. It was very well made so I think it deserves respect for that. I'm sure it works for some.
customer_reviews.author: lrnbsn

customer_reviews.title: Good, but be careful about the size
customer_reviews.text: Great product--correct measurements, soft enough, great weight, and great design. One regret--I wish I would've gotten the bigger sizes. So if you are considering buying this item... I STRONGLY RECOMMEND YOU FIND A BLANKET IN YOUR HOUSE AND ACTUALLY MEASURE OUT THE MEASUREMENTS LISTED HERE ON THE WEBSITE. Once you're actually under it, laying down, moving around and wrapping it around your body, chances are high that each size will be a lot smaller than you think it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the blanket for just about 4 months now, havent washed it yet, use it 4 or 5 nights/week atop a flat sheet. The weight is good and I definitely sleep better with it, but about a week ago the guts started leaking! I've examined it thoroughly for holes or tears and can't find anything but every morning I wake up and my bed is covered in the little bead things. I was so excited about the blanket and had bragged about it to numerous friends. Disappointed to see the quality deteriorate so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Grassi

customer_reviews.title: I slept worse.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had been having trouble sleeping and just felt anxious at night. Unfortunately this blanket did not help. It actually made things worse. I tossed and turned all night and I felt extremely uncomfortable and hot. I wanted it to work but it’s not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G

customer_reviews.title: Overall, it’s a great blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this blanket nightly for 4 wks. I have mixed feelings about it . Hate to rate it before I’ve adjusted to it but here are my thoughts for now... 5 stars for weight, color and helping me sleep. It is amazing on these important items!! 3 stars bc it makes me itch...I think I’ll have to find a cover for it but for now I have a sheet folded over it. Also, I find that many nights I awaken feeling really hot and sweaty...keeping a journal to see if something else is disturbing my sleep on these nights. Hence, the 4 stars until I’ve used it longer.
customer_reviews.author: LarBear

customer_reviews.title: Knocks you right out
customer_reviews.text: This is the winning Christmas gift of 2018! My husband works horrific hours (wakes at 2am) so Getting and staying asleep is important. He's used everything from white noise machines to melatonin. This 22lb weighted blanket has been the ticket. He no longer needs 5 compforters on his side of the bed. The only drawback so far, it's dry clean only. We are searching for a duvet cover post haste.
customer_reviews.author: Maux

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I got my blanket yesterday, put the duvet on and thought all was well. I was wrong. All the bead shifted to the outter edges of the blanket instead of staying in the “pockets”. There was literally no weight left in the center of the blanket. Kind of defeats the purpose of a weighted blanket
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct weight.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great blanket doesn’t run too hot. However no way the weight is what it says. I have to fold in half to get the weighted feeling. I have another that is 15lbs and it feels way heavier than this 16lb one that I got.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Stopped the middle of the night I can’t sleep mom
customer_reviews.text: My child was having moments of coming into my room about 2 hours after going to bed and was having random nightmares. This has cured her of those issues all together. She sleeps great through the night it has even helped with her tossing and turning. She waking up well rested and a lot more cheery!! The thing is you have to make sure it’s evenly distributed so it doesn’t form warm spots. But she loves it she’d take it everywhere if it wasn’t for the fact that I know I’d end up carrying a 7 pound blanket for her lol!! It is soft and the design is cute!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: What a difference this blanket makes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about month ago. I have general anxiety for no known reason. I just can't settle my brain to go to sleep at night. This blanket made me feel warm and snuggly without being smothered or making me feel hot. When I pull it on top of me I can feel my body relax and I immediately become sleepy. I recommend buying the duvet to cover it because it will be a challenge to wash the blanket in a regular washer due to the weight. The duvet makes cleaning it a snap. If you want a good night's sleep, do yourself a favor and buy this blanket. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Josh J.

customer_reviews.title: 20 lbs is really heavy
customer_reviews.text: Consider less than 20lbs. This is like sleeping in a coffin. Don't think he are going to move or roll over. Then you get hot so you try to stick a foot out. The cats keep pouncing on it because it is really lots of little sewed in squares with like sand in it. You are supposed to hand wash this but I have no idea how I am going to dry it as it will weight like 40 lbs then. And will the filling then turn to mud? It is good looking. On cold nights very cosy. I just wish that I had picked a little less weight.
customer_reviews.author: catwrangler

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this blanket
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has issues getting to sleep and sleeping through the night unless she sleeps with our dog for comfort. With her going to college next year we have been trying to find a way to help her relax and sleep. This blanket so far has done the trick. The first night she only woke up once and now she says she sleeps pretty good. Huge improvement. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jedet02

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I sent my weighted blanket back after one night- too heavy- felt like sleeping under a sack of sand- not at all restful as described in articles I had read. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Long distance hugs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket for my grandma, in order to help with her chronic fybromialg pain and associated anxiety. Not only does she sleep better, she also uses it during the day. She describes is as a comforting hug, that helps her when she feels anxious. I live in VT, and she's is Boston, so it's as if I'm able to give her long distance hugs! My grandma loved it shop much that I got a second one for my grandpa. He's in a nursing home, suffering from dementia, anxiety and depression. This blanket has been perfect for him. He said he feels less alone when he has it. That makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Trishini

customer_reviews.title: My fiancee loves it, Im not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiancee as she always wanted one and i was curious. For me, its comfy to lay on the couch wrapped in but sleeping in it was not my cup of tea. I toss and turn a lot so i would wake up constantly from not being able to move. My fiancee absolutely loves sleeping in it though! So just be aware that if you turn a lot in bed, you will wake up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Graham

customer_reviews.title: 😠
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do anything claimed by the manufacturer and is quite uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ng

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it but it leaks
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but the insides are leaking out. Grains of sand or something
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Weighted Idea blanket that I've purchased in the last three months. Everyone in my family keeps requesting their own once they've tested out the first one we bought. I see a lot of reviews of other blankets complaining about the beads moving around too much but so far nobody has had that experience with this blanket. We didn't purchase the covers yet but I'm thinking that as much use as we are getting out of these blankets, I should buy them just to make sure they stay in good shape. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Collins

customer_reviews.title: If I had known to order this blanket by weight, I would have done so.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is definitely too heavy for me. I weight 160. I odered the 20 lb blanket, not knowing it should be ordered by weight!!!!!! I contacted you by a review and was asked to continue to use it until I felt comfortable with it. I still do not feel comfortable with the weight of this blanket. There were no instructions as to ordering it by your weight when I ordered this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: Helped my insomnia greatly
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. I originally bought it because someone suggested it for my restless legs. I also have insomnia regularly. It didn’t really help with the restless legs but it definitely helps with my insomnia. I’ve been falling asleep quicker and sleeping deeper. The fabric is soft. I love the weight of the blanket. It feels cozy. It can be a tiny bit trucker to change sleeping positions or pull the blanket in a certain direction due to the weight but it’s totally worth it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You are in for a pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this purchase but it sounded good. This blanket is amazing. At 15 lbs queen size it seemed heavy and was worried about it being hot. Not so. I have been using this blanket very night. I'm swaddled, not smothered. Warm but never too hot. I actually sleep more, toss and turn less. Wake up rested and refreshed. I am a 73 year old,, 5ft3 female at 160 lbs. The weight of this blanket is perfect. Only need suggestions on how to handwash when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Zettie thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to live with...
customer_reviews.text: I think this blanket might be comfy on a bed where you could just climb under and feel the weight, which is nice. I enjoy it in my chair, but find that I can't just throw it off, nor can I reach over and pull it on top of me like a regular sofa blanket. It surprised me that it wasn't extremely hot, which was nice. I like it but it isn't something I can toss on my sofa and it isn't large enough for my bed, so I'm trying to think of where to keep it . I'm pretty sure it'll end up at good will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and awesome
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this blanket I was taken aback a bit because of its weight. On my first night sleeping with it I discovered that its heaviness actually was comforting. I fully expected it to roast me while I was sleeping. Just the exact opposite of what I expected. I actually felt cool the entire night! I still can't believe that I am sleeping with a fifteen lb. blanket on top of me.
customer_reviews.author: wthw_us_4nk410x

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this blanket- but after a couple of days ( the sand) or whatever is inside if the blanket- started go to the sides and there was nothing in the middle- which defeats the purpose! I have to wrestle with it to get it to even out. Wondering if it’s supposed to be this way. I’m ready to put it in the trash! If the insides were to stay put I would love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lw

customer_reviews.title: I am sleeping better. Twitching feet can hardly twitch under this thing
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to work. I am sleeping better. Twitching feet can hardly twitch under this thing. But just what I needed. No noticeable heat either.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Absolute life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I read about these a while back but finally bit the bullet so to speak. I've always slept better with weight on my legs and had been using folded blankets for a long time but that just isnt great during the hot summer! The first night I used this I woke up so sore! It held me down and I didn't move the entire night, I had no idea how restless a sleeper I was. This blanket makes a huge difference in my sleep quality, but the glass beads prevent it from being stifling or overly hot.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: My calm place is wherever this blanket is!
customer_reviews.text: I always loved wearing the weighted apron for x-rays at the dentist's office, and now I think I know why! This blanket has had a very calming effect on me when I'm feeling the feels. It keeps me tethered to Earth when I feel like everything's spiraling out of control. The floral pattern material is beautiful and simple, and it doesn't get any hotter than a regular coverlet would, in spite of the weight. Speaking of which, no freaking way is this thing 15 lbs. I haven't weighed it yet, but I believe it means it puts 15 lbs. of pressure on you. I wish there were a larger selection of patterns, I'd like to keep one in every room!
customer_reviews.author: Sallygirl

customer_reviews.title: Fairly priced item, quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at a sub-40 pricepoint and the recipient absolutely adores it. Not a huge fan of having to buy the removable cover separately but I guess that's how they make a buck. Haven't had it long enough to get soiled but I'm anticipating a struggle. But I'd still recommend the blanket for restless sleeper in your life. Would be 5 stars if cover was included at a reasonable additional increase to price. As of now the cover costs almost as much as the blanket from the manufacturer. Will update if anything goes awry.
customer_reviews.author: B. S.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing cooling about this!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a 20 lb. weighted blanket for a couple of years now and I love it! I live in SoCal and thought I would get a cooler blanket for summer. Ha! This was supposed to be 100% cotton, but it felt synthetic, almost like plastic. I used it one night and had to get up in the middle of the night and ice my feet. They had turned bright red and burned, along with my hands. I have never had this happen before or since! Sent it back and am still using my 20 pounder with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: DepoSD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Unfortunately Quality Didn't Hold
customer_reviews.text: After just a few weeks of using this, the stiches tore on the bottom of the blanket, releasing thousands of little glass? beads all over the place. I haven't used it since but need to get it stitched back up.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Lost beads over a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: While having the blanket on my bed for a few months (never washing) the blanket has lost majority of the beads that make the blanket weighted.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Not the actual size as stated.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the blanket that I received is NOT what was suppose to be. The blanket is a SMALL lap size blanket. It was advertised as a 41x60 twin size. The blanket came in a bag, that says it is a 33x30 cm. There is a white label on the bag that says 41x60. There is definitely, an issue with the size of the blanket. I am disappointed. I was expecting a twin size blanket. Buyer beware of the measurement of the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort level is fine, but smells very bad
customer_reviews.text: This blanket on its own is not very soft at all. A duvet cover should help with that. Can’t really tell the sleep quality because I’ve only just started using it. One thing I hate, it smells like a fart. A really bad fart. It’s just always there sneaking up into my nose and it never gets better. The smell is very overwhelming and unpleasant. It really puts me in a bad mood before I sleep
customer_reviews.author: Noorah AlFaddagh

customer_reviews.title: Okay- slightly dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. I get WAY to hot, thought these were neutral and kept you cool/neutral but I get really hot by middle of night. Bought the 12 pound and I'm only 93 pounds- was nervous it would be too heavy but not at all. Not soft- but I need a duvet. It's helped a tiny bit- I think really just the sensation of weight makes me feel "snug like a bug in a rug".
customer_reviews.author: yardohkelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just not a good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and seemed to be of good quality. My review is based solely on my own experience and not a negative about the quality of the product. It was too hot to sleep under, for me, and not big enough for my queen sized bed.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C.

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions on kid blanket are off.
customer_reviews.text: The length of the kid size is not as long as the 60” stated in the description. I measured it at 54”. This might not last for much longer, but I don’t want to purchase the longer blanket because it would go up in weight as well. My kid is on the slender side and should stick with the 7lbs blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole N. Peerson

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about a weighted blanket however that quickly changed. From the first night I fell asleep in minutes and slept soundly all night and I have every night since. It is not too hot not too heavy to be uncomfortable. I feel it is well worth the money. I have struggled with sleep issues getting 4-5 hours of sleep a night. I sleep 7-8 hours and feel well rested in the morning. I would highly recommend this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Unraveling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 1/2 year old daughter. I wanted to love it. At first it looked great but I noticed almost immediately it was unraveling in a few spots. We haven’t even had it 3 weeks and I worry about the longevity of it. I haven’t washed it because I’m worried it will completely fall apart and unravel.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading numerous reviews, mostly of people talking about how life-changing it was for them. I did not have that experience. The heaviness did not feel comforting to me at all. It just felt heavy. It also made me hot which the reviews said didn’t happen. It kept me from tossing and turning as much as I normally did but it didn’t help me feel more rested. I have back and neck issues which seemed exacerbated by the weight. After three weeks of use , I sent it back. It was disappointing. I had really hoped for the amazing experience so many had written about.
customer_reviews.author: peggle

customer_reviews.title: SO heavy and difficult to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have developed restless legs at night when trying to sleep. I thought this would help, sometimes it does, sometimes not. I ordered the 25lb blanket because of the weight chart. This thing is SO heavy, I can barely move it and it actually hurts my hands when I try to because of this. If I had it to do over, I would definitely get no more than the 20lb blanket. It also is HOT when it's warm out (not cooling as I read from many other reviews), but does keep me warm when it's chilly. Perhaps this wasn't the right purchase for my issue, but it's on my bed nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mine has a tiny hole in in somewhere that isn't even visible to the human eye and whoever made the blanket decided to use some synthetic material finer than sand to fill the blanket and it literally covered all my sheets in this fine grit. It was so fine I couldn't even brush it off my sheets completely. Really disappointed that its not made better considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: We have a duo opinion at our home. I love this weighted blanket. At first I didn't think it was heavy enough, but it is perfect. You will want to shed some blankets because this sure keeps you warm as well. My husband on the other hand, doesn't like the weight, which is too bad because I actually bought it for him. I sleep like a baby. If you think your spouse will not like the weight, you can always choose to go to a smaller size just for yourself. This is a great product. I would not hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Loved the material, felt like my down comforter. I put this ontop of my normal thin blanket. Hurt my my back if I slept on my belly because of the weight but felt fine when I slept on my back. Made me terribly overheated at night and I am always cold at night. Between my husband and I in a queen bed we liked the concept but for two very different types of sleepers, it made the nights difficult. We returned it and would not purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic but not a Queen size
customer_reviews.text: This blanket has a great weight to it and is amazing to sleep with but definitely do not buy a Queen for a queen bed. My husband and I pretty much have to take turn with it. If you are single, have at it! It will work for one person. It exactly covers the very top of a queen bed. Would work great for a twin bed. Would give 5 stars if the sizing wasn't so terribly misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Great for anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to wife to help out her anxiety, since the first night, she sleeps all night through. Just make sure to calculate the person's weight and buy a 10% weight product, yes, I did a full research.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Barreda

customer_reviews.title: Weight suggestions are not necessarily accurate. .
customer_reviews.text: I carefully read reviews and weight suggestions as thus was an item my husband really wanted for Christmas. Foe his weight, it was suggested I purchase 25lb blanket. It is much too heavy and instead of helping him sleep, he could not sleep unless he took it off. He tried for several nights to see if he just needed to get use to it, but much too heavy. We would like to exchange for a 15lb blanket (even though that is 10lbs less than suggested).
customer_reviews.author: derek shinden

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply made I ordered it because it was the only one I could find that had a 20 lb twin size but I don't like it enough to keep it so I'm returning it and getting a lesser weight from a product that's better quality!
customer_reviews.author: Truth be told

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase I've Made All Year
customer_reviews.text: I'd wanted a weighted blanket for some time when, on a whim, I checked Amazon one evening and found this one. It had an excellent price so I ordered. I have not been disappointed. In fact, I have recommended it to several others who have also purchased this blanket. It does not make me hot during the night and has been an excellent choice for helping with anxiety. I've even had clients request this blanket be placed over them when I'm doing Reiki treatments. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad blanket, but sandy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sandy. It seemed to leak sand for a while. Pay more and get the beads, etc. My wife uses it and loves the weight, but not the "sandy" feeling it leaves behind. It's a decent enough blanket, but spending more on a blanket with better quality "fill" or weights would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket but..
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this blanket. It was comfy, helped me sleep, I felt a calming comfort, etc.., but it made my body ache. For some reason the little amount of weight that was on my body was enough for me to wake up with aches in my back, legs and knee. I googled weighted blankets and body ache and found someone that went to doctors, chiropractor, etc., with no relief but then discovered it was the blanket. I'm sure this is not common, but just as an FYI this could happen. After I stopped using the blanket my aches went away. I was able to return the blanket with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S

customer_reviews.title: Now I can stop borrowing my son's!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about these years ago. I had been experiencing trouble sleeping and my son suggested I try his weighted blanket. I had forgotten what it was like to sleep a complete night and, needless to say, I slept like a baby. He didn't get his back until I ordered and received mine! These appear to e very well made and only time will tell about their durability. If my son's blanket is any example I have at least three years worth of good nights sleep ahead of me. At least, that is as old as his is and his doesn't look like it is in any danger of wearing out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Fred E

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this a while ago - and have had time to use the product for a while now. I loved it at first, but all the weighted beads have since shifted to two spots on the outside. Because of this, the actual blanket doesn't feel like it has any weight, just the two corners where it now pools. Now, I've tried to lift the blanket and spread it all back out... that lasts for a solid 30 minutes before it's all pooling in the same spots again. Otherwise, the blanket was good, but sadly this was a huge turn-off for me considering the blanket wasn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Storm

customer_reviews.title: This is not a miracle blanket to cure isomia!
customer_reviews.text: The blanket seems good as far as the material and weight. I couldn't have a good night sleep since it's just way too hot and too heavy to place only on the mid-section of my body. It also needed to be put in a duvet because there's no way to wash this 15 pounds blanket when it gets dirty. However, I don't know where can one find a duvet to fit this blanket since its actual size is 46 x 78.
customer_reviews.author: CutePug

customer_reviews.title: Not evenly distributed
customer_reviews.text: This blanket’s weight easily gets moved around so it is all bunched on one side of the blanket and it drives me nuts. I wish I could return it for a blanket that is sewn in many squares like a quilt so they don’t get bunched up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, hot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 15 lb... it creates a bit of anxiety for me; I feel trapped underneath it at times. Would have preferred a lighter blanket. Also, it is very very hot in spite of the description. Disrupted my sleep due to heat.
customer_reviews.author: LadyD

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blanket for the money. I’ve seen many priced much higher. I purchased this blanket because I have neuropathy in my feet and legs. My legs and feet will become extremely swollen and painful and the pressure from this blanket does help. I have not used it on my bed, but do use it in my zero gravity chair when I have a flare. However, I do not know what is “cooling” about this blanket. It will make you quite toasty warm really quickly. I plan on putting this blanket on my bed once it gets colder out because I’m sure it’ll keep me warm!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha L. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, VERY warm blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty severe sleep onset insomnia. I like falling asleep with this blanket on top of my regular blanket. I tried sleeping with just the weighted blanket and I get too hot, but that’s just me. So I just wake up at some point and kick it off and sleep the rest of the night with my regular blanket only. Combined with the sleep med I found that actually works, I get to sleep pretty fast now.
customer_reviews.author: Aja Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Still works!
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few months since I purchased this blanket. The blanket is soft and it still holds its shape. No problem with the contents spilling out. The material is pretty breathable and I have not experienced any unusual excessive heat build up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more night sweats!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. I am sleeping better but mostly because, for whatever reason, I don’t sweat when using it. I frequently wake up sweating but with this blanket, I have not had a single night like that. It is snuggly and does make you feel very comforted but the no sweating thing, especially in summer, has me sold. It did not come with a cover so I had to make one for it so it would stay clean. Otherwise, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy VanPelt

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for people with joint pain.
customer_reviews.text: Heard that weighted blankets helped with anxiety, insomnia, and sensory issues. Having all three, I got one. What I didn't factor in was my joint pain. The ten percent of my body weight extra on my sore joints brought on a sense of claustrophobia that did the opposite of what the blanket was advertised to help with. Sadly had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, works great, just not very compatible with Texas heat
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket! It’s helped ease me into sleep and KEEP me asleep so well! My one and only complaint is that I live in South central Texas and it gets HOT here. So I can only have this awesome blanket half on/half off during the summer unless I want to burst into flame. I wish they made weighted blankets that didn’t trap so much heat! But I deal with it because this blanket is soft, comfortable, cozy, and the weight of it is so so so comforting.
customer_reviews.author: Ania O'Beirne

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket, wrong item.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great blanket but I don't think they sent the right one. I got a purple one instead of the coral pink I ordered and it seems a bit heavier than the 20lbs I ordered... I didn't open it before I gave it away as a gift so my sister opening it and seeing it was purple was quite a confusing experience. Luckily, she likes purple better than pink but perhaps better care should be taken to make sure the proper item is being delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Good weight, but I was constantly overheating
customer_reviews.text: I started looking into weighted blankets because a lot of people in my circle were starting to talk about weighted blankets and the benefits. I wanted to improve my sleep quality and the "cooling beads" and breathability were selling points that led me to try out this blanket. The weight was great, but I felt like I was definitely overheating with this blanket. I contacted the seller and they worked with me on the return so I am giving 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great products, helps with anxiety and sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my life. I used to struggle with falling asleep/staying asleep but I have this on top of my comforter and sleep with it every night. It’s sooooo comforting and suppresses my anxiety. Can’t imagine sleeping without it now!!! It’s a bit expensive, but so worth it. The quality is great and has held up perfectly with daily use for the past 6 months. I really like the gray color, and haven’t had any issues with seams ripping or anything. Be sure to get the right weight for your body weight/personal preference!
customer_reviews.author: Krisxan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the navy floral blanket 60x80. According to the description, it’s a “Queen” size, however, it looks more like a Full sized blanket. Aside from being smaller than I had expected, it’s fabulous This blanket comes highly recommended by this Amazon customer!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Really works and so relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Yes I was worried that it's all hype. I was in the hospital and they have such flimsy sheets. Family member suggested this since they noticed I had some 5 blankets on me. And not because I like heat. Tried it, slept well. Bought one for my daughter who has high anxiety. Has helped, but you know the young people these days. The sky is falling. Then I bought as a Christmas gift for a 40 year old friend. He called to tell me how great it was and let him sleep more. Says he might be my friend for another 40 year. Damn!
customer_reviews.author: HD Bru

customer_reviews.title: Does not drape over mattress
customer_reviews.text: When we order a queen comforter it usually drapes over the mattress on both sides. This does not. It fits exactly on top of the mattress. This was weird at fist, but I think that is the design of it. I have only slept in it one night but it was nice. I enjoy the weight. It wasn't too much weight in my opinion. My husband also enjoyed it. We wish it was wider and draped over the mattress so we wouldn't move and the whole thing slid to one side. If you have a queen definitely order a king and see if that improves.
customer_reviews.author: Tona Foster

customer_reviews.title: Did see, after delivery, that my navy weighted ...
customer_reviews.text: Did see, after delivery, that my navy weighted blanket was just the insert, and did not come with the duvet cover. Truly I wish this was made plain in the product listing. Assumed since I chose a color it included a cover. The instructions even say to wash unzip the cover...but no cover comes with it. Realize I missed this very important point in the product details...but I'd advise the seller to make this a bit clearer in the product listing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Helps my child with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is in college. He said that it helps him sleep and rest better. I do wish it was washable. I tried purchasing a washable cover for it but the wrong cover was sent and had to be returned and I just didn’t try to order another one. We will just see about getting it dry cleaned when it gets dirty. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Improved sleep, even in warm weather
customer_reviews.text: I followed the “10% of you body weight” rule, and this works great for me. I think it makes my whole body relax. My main concern was that I would get too hot. So far this has not been any more hot for me than a basic thin throw blanket. I didn’t get the duvet cover, because it looked like it would be hot. Was able to find a cotton one instead, which works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Smahouski

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept. Way too hot
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept. It did help me fall asleep faster and not toss and turn. The problem was waking up in a pool of sweat in the middle of the night. Couldn't get the bedroom cold enough to make it comfortable
customer_reviews.author: lpiperdclark

customer_reviews.title: Not too hot and very soothing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who has trouble sleeping and it works like a charm. The day it came in, he was already lounging on the couch, so I covered him and he was asleep in 5 minutes. It’s heavy, but not hot. I have hot flashes and night sweats and this is bearable.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good product but overpriced for sure
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly all it was hyped up for, id give it a better rating but not for the price point and the quality it offered. Also feels like it doesn't retain heat very well, look for a cheaper one, this one's nice but not that nice.
customer_reviews.author: Iván

customer_reviews.title: Too big but great blanket
customer_reviews.text: I received this blanket wanting it to be a throw over while sitting on couch. I unfortunately ordered one 60x80 that would cover a queen size bed. I will state that the blanket was nicely weighted and soft but returned only because of the size. I also purchase a duvet cover to protect it. I will be buying again. Only a smaller size. Did not rate sleep because I did not use for sleep
customer_reviews.author: payrez

customer_reviews.title: High quality but not cooling! Buy the cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made weighted blanket. I bought the 15 lb dark grey & two covers. The design is thoughtful with the ties inside the cover meeting the tabs on the blanket. I gave it 4 stars only because it is described as "cooling", which it is definitely not. I have non combat PTSD and it has been great for lessening the impact of my semi-regular nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: soft and heavy, but tore within 2 months :(
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this blanket, and was really happy with it when I got it. It's big and the beads are sewn into individual squares so the weight is distributed evenly throughout the blanket. Since using it, I've been sleeping more soundly and feel more rested upon waking. However, I went to bed the other night and noticed that some of the beads were falling out and the stitching was coming out (haven't washed or dry cleaned it since buying it). I'm really disappointed because I've only had it a month and a half and I really loved the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Steph L.

customer_reviews.title: A better night’s sleep
customer_reviews.text: I use this blanket every night. I first bought a 12 lb twin size blanket and returned it to get a 25 lb twin size blanket. I have always liked to sleep with lots of blankets because the weight was comforting, but this blanket is even better because I can use it during warmer seasons. On hot summer nights, I was still able to have the comfort of a heavy blanket, but I didn’t get hot like I would if I just piled on the blankets. This product would be difficult to gift because the weight and size would depend on the preferences of the person receiving the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Della M. Dolby
